q: other day. "The Lady is passionate and I do not doubt her commitment," he said. "Don't patronise me!" came the cry from across the Commons floor. The Lady has won an Oscar for being successfully patronising to others, said Michael Gove . "Two Oscars!" came the retort. Get it right, minister. series at 1-1. Game 3 of the best-of-five Eastern Conference quarterfinals is Saturday in Indiana. "I'm going to remember this game for a long time," said Allen Iverson , who also had nine assists.
